Time Inc. Time-Life News Service Records

The Ex-Staff Files cover the period of 1943 through 1987 and contain a mix of biographical and personnel files for Time-Life News Service staff, correspondents, and bureau chiefs designated as ex-staff by the Time Inc. Archives at the time they received the records. Included in this subseries are employee profile forms, financial statements, dispatches, expense reports, receipts, invoices, requisition forms, company share forms and reports, tax forms, clippings, moving expense forms, query sheets, allowance forms, resignation forms, benefit summary forms, payroll forms, photographs, employment verification forms, list of meeting and luncheon attendees, invitations, itinerary, stringer payment statistics, vacation schedule forms, cash advance request forms, bookkeeping statements, employment applications, employment policies, negatives, CVs, resumes, schedules, bureau reports, department heads lists, foreign desk operating policy, lists of staff and correspondence. The correspondence included in this series discusses staffing changes, bureau operations, bureau updates, expenses, debts, advances, leaves of absence, budgets, allowances, bureau purchases, travel, vacations, medical leave, visas, account statuses, deaths, retirements, job applicants, job responsibilities, termination agreements, evaluations, stringer payments, raises, salaries, assignments, job openings, meetings, and editorial procedures.
